name: Database table naming convention - prefix control
description:
For maintainability and readability reasons, names of tables should start with a prefix.
This reports shows all the database Tables not starting with the prefix.

The prefix value is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all database tables that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
Table full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.
reference:
Enhancing the Quality of ABAP Development, 
Meijs-Krouwels-Heulmans-Sommen, SAP Press
ISBN 1-59229-030-2
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
remediationSample:
Remediation valid for SAP applications :
The name should be: ZTORDER or ZT_ORDER.
sample:
Sample valid for SAP applications :
The following name does not respect naming conventions for SAP database tables: ZORDER
